QuestData.Title: The Secret of the Fungus
QuestData.Description: It smells here and there are whispers.$b$bI feel there is a connection between the plants and beasts here. Special mushrooms seem to focus the beasts' attention.$b$bGo and get some of these for me. I... need... them.
QuestData.RewardText: Yes, they smell... wonderful. These will help me find the power of this marsh and take it for my own.
